godkiller.party-requirement: Gunner, Masked Dancer, or Berserker Lineages

bloodrain-twin-ninpo.name: Bloodrain Twin Ninpo
bloodrain-twin-ninpo.description: Deals severe physical Slash damage to one enemy. Removes status, Repel, and strength buff effects on the target.

round-slash.name: Round Slash
round-slash.description: Deals weak physical Slash damage to all enemies.

bamboo-splitter.name: Bamboo Splitter
bamboo-splitter.description: Deals heavy physical Slash damage to one enemy. Adds one Turn Icon on a killing blow.

peerless-stonecleaver.name: Peerless Stonecleaver
peerless-stonecleaver.description: Deals severe physical Slash damage to one enemy. Adds one Turn Icon on a killing blow.
peerless-stonecleaver.party-requirement: Warrior, Thief, or Masked Dancer Lineages AND Warrior, Brawler, or Berserker Lineages

round-slash.name: Round Slash
round-slash.description: Deals weak physical Slash damage to all enemies.

vorpal-blade.name: Vorpal Blade
vorpal-blade.description: Deals extreme physical Slash damage to all enemies. Decreases their Attack for 3 turns.

bamboo-splitter.name: Bamboo Splitter
bamboo-splitter.description: Deals heavy physical Slash damage to one enemy. Adds one Turn Icon on a killing blow.

phantom-swordsarm.name: Phantom Swordsarm
phantom-swordsarm.description: Deals medium physical Slash damage 4-6 times to one enemy. If it's a killing blow, adds one Turn Icon.
